message: What are you guys talking about? Is everything okay?
No, something happened last night...
The police arrested Antonio and charged him with drug trafficking. I was involved too.
What?! How did that happen?
We were buying weed from a guy we thought we could trust. But he was actually an undercover cop.
Oh no, that's terrible. Have you talked to a lawyer?
Not yet, we're still trying to figure out what to do.
You should definitely talk to a lawyer as soon as possible. They can help you understand your options and guide you through the legal process.
I know a great lawyer who specializes in drug cases. I can give you their contact information if you want.
Here: John Doe +447761123432
Thanks, Sarah. I appreciate it. I'll get in touch with them right away.
Let me know if you need anything else, Alex. I'm here to help.
Yeah, same here. We're all in this together.
Thanks, guys. I really appreciate your support. This is all so overwhelming.
I can only imagine. But we'll get through it together.
Btw, Alex, did you guys discuss the details of the deal over the phone or in person?
We talked about it over the phone and then met in person to make the exchange.
Did you mention anything specific about the location of the exchange?
No, we just agreed to meet at a certain time and place.
That's good. If the police don't have any recorded evidence of you discussing the exchange location, it might be harder for them to prove their case.
I hope you're right, Sarah. This whole situation is a nightmare.
Do you guys know if Antonio has a lawyer yet?
I'm not sure, I haven't been able to reach him yet.
I can try calling his family and see if they know anything.
That's a good idea.
Yeah, let us know if you find anything out.
Okay, I just spoke with his sister. She said he hasn't been able to get a lawyer yet because he can't afford one.
That's terrible.
Is there anything we can do to help?
I'm not sure, but I can look into some organizations that offer legal aid to people who can't afford it.
Sounds good!
Thanks, Sarah. I appreciate it. I'll get in touch with them right away.
Hey guys, I've just been let out of the station. This has been a wild ride!
Yeah, it's a nightmare. We didn't know that guy was an undercover cop.
I told you guys not to trust him. He's been in trouble with the law before.
Wait, what do you mean he's been in trouble with the law before?
He's a drug dealer, he got caught smuggling cocaine over the border once.
I've bought drugs from him before.
Antonio, why didn't you tell us this before!?
I didn't want to get anyone in trouble. I thought I could handle it on my own. I didn't know how tell Amy about it either.
Well, now we're all in trouble. We need to figure out how to get out of this mess.
Don't worry, I just sold my last bag. I bought the weed last Friday night from a guy named Carlos. He hangs out at the convenience store on 5th and Main.
Do you remember how much you paid for them?
Yeah, I paid $200 for an ounce.
Wow, that's really expensive. How much did you sell it for?
I sold it for $20 a gram. I made a pretty good profit.
But it's not worth the risk of getting arrested and going to jail. I hope you guys learned your lesson.
Yeah, we definitely did. We won't be making that mistake again.
Agreed. Let's focus on moving forward and making better choices in the future.
Hey guys, I wanted to talk to you about something. I know we got in trouble because of the weed, but I think we can make some serious money if we buy more and sell them.
Just look at this…
Antonio, are you serious? You know what happened the last time we got involved with drugs. We're lucky we're not in jail right now.
I know, but that was because we didn't know what we were doing. This time, we can be more careful and make sure we don't get caught. Plus, I already have a buyer lined up.
Antonio, I don't think that's a good idea. We could get into even more trouble.

Come on, guys. This could be our chance to make some real money. And if we're careful, we won't get caught. I already bought some yesterday, and they're good quality. We could sell them for a huge profit.
I don't know if that's such a good idea. We could get into even more trouble if we start selling drugs again.
I agree with Alex, we should stay away from that kind of thing.
Fine, if that's how you feel.... But I'm telling you, we're missing out on a huge opportunity here.
